meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of television.
meanings.sent1: The televisual program was colorful and entertaining.
meanings.sent2: The televisual broadcast captured the attention of many viewers.
meanings.sent3: The televisual show made me laugh with its funny characters.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a televisual screen, bright and engaging.
meanings.sent5: The televisual advertisement was so catchy, I couldn't stop humming the jingle.

meanings.definition: Suitable for or appearing on television.
meanings.sent1: The actors wore televisual costumes that looked great on screen.
meanings.sent2: The televisual production had high-quality visuals and sound.
meanings.sent3: The televisual event was so exciting, it felt like a real-life drama.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was televisual, making her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The televisual performance left the audience in awe with its special effects.
